about.name: Hubert Okoń
about.bio: BSc in Computer Science at Maria-Curie Skłodowska University in Poland. Currently studies master in applied computer science. Specializes in CI/CD systems and cloud cost reduction. Loves programming and old Macintosh computers.

projects.title: Acer is not a Mac, but can run macOS
projects.description: Project about running macOS on unsupported hardware. Provides details on how to run it on non-Apple hardware

projects.title: Jenkins Controller + worker ready to go environment
projects.description: Simply execute docker-compose up, visit given url and enjoy ready to go CI/CD environment with architecture of Jenkins Controller and one Jenkins worker. Perfect environment for performing interviews, sandbox testing and benchmarking
